mapper.select: SELECT years.year, COALESCE(p.count_transaction, 0) transactioncnt, COALESCE(p.sum_sales, 0) DATETOTALSALES FROM ( SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) - LEVEL + 1 year FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 10 ) years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) year, SUM(TRANSACTIONCNT) count_transaction, SUM(DATETOTALSALES) sum_sales FROM PACKAGEPRICE GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) ) p ON years.year = p.year ORDER BY years.year

SELECT months.month, COALESCE(p.count_transaction, 0) AS transactioncnt, COALESCE(p.sum_sales, 0) AS DATETOTALSALES FROM ( SELECT 1 AS month from dual UNION ALL SELECT 2 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 3 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 4 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 5 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 6 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 7 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 8 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 9 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 10 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 11 from dual UNION ALL SELECT 12 from dual ) months LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EXTRACT(month FROM SALESDATE) AS month, SUM(TO_NUMBER(TRANSACTIONCNT)) AS count_transaction, SUM(TO_NUMBER(DATETOTALSALES)) AS sum_sales FROM PACKAGEPRICE WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) = #{year} GROUP BY EXTRACT(month FROM SALESDATE) ) p ON months.month = p.month ORDER BY months.month

SELECT EXTRACT(day FROM b.dt) AS day, NVL(sum(a.TRANSACTIONCNT), 0) AS TRANSACTIONCNT, NVL(sum(a.DATETOTALSALES), 0) AS DATETOTALSALES FROM ( SELECT SALESDATE as hiredate, sum(TRANSACTIONCNT) as TRANSACTIONCNT, sum(DATETOTALSALES) as DATETOTALSALES FROM PACKAGEPRICE WHERE SALESDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{day2}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{day1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY SALESDATE
) a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{day2}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{day1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(#{day2}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b ON b.dt = a.hiredate GROUP BY b.dt ORDER BY b.dt

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pkgid AS pkgid, pkgname, salesdate, transactioncnt, datetotalsales, ROWNUM AS rn FROM ( SELECT PACKAGE.PKGID AS pkgid, pkgname, TO_char(salesdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS salesdate, SUM(transactioncnt) AS transactioncnt, SUM(datetotalsales) AS datetotalsales FROM PACKAGEPRICE JOIN PACKAGE ON (PACKAGEPRICE.PKGID = PACKAGE.PKGID) GROUP BY PACKAGE.PKGID, pkgname, TO_char(salesdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY salesdate DESC ) package ) where rn between #{startNo} and #{endNo}

select count(*) from ( SELECT PACKAGEPRICE.pkgid as pkgid,pkgname,salesdate,transactioncnt,datetotalsales FROM PACKAGEPRICE JOIN PACKAGE ON (PACKAGEPRICE.PKGID = PACKAGE.PKGID) order by salesdate desc )
SELECT sum(TRANSACTIONCNT) as TRANSACTIONCNT, sum(DATETOTALSALES) as DATETOTALSALES FROM PACKAGEPRICE

SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) year, sum(TRANSACTIONCNT) TRANSACTIONCNT, SUM(DATETOTALSALES) DATETOTALSALES FROM PACKAGEPRICE where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) = #{year} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) ORDER BY year

SELECT EXTRACT(month FROM SALESDATE) month, sum(TRANSACTIONCNT) TRANSACTIONCNT, SUM(DATETOTALSALES) DATETOTALSALES FROM PACKAGEPRICE where EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) = #{year} and EXTRACT(month FROM SALESDATE) = #{month} GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SALESDATE) , EXTRACT(month FROM SALESDATE) ORDER BY month
